author: A_Brickset_user
title: great!
review:
Got this one for my birthday from my grandmother, I played with it till I fell asleep on top of it... Its just a very 
compact truckie! 
Secretly hoping lego will make a bigger firetruck, with a biiiiiiig ladder on top!

author: hobby_boy
title: i really like this set!
review:
i got this set about 8 years ago and i really like it
Pros
Great extendable hose pipe
working steering
Brings hours of fun - 2 models

Cons
Fire engine doesn't have motor gearing in
i can't seem to get the new power functions m motor working in it properly

In the end, it is a great set and will be good for a beginner. All i need now is the 8720 motor set

author: gome4
title: how cant you like it
review:
you get so much play time out of it its unbelievable.

pros
looks cool(and is)
both hoses
helmet stand
you wind the cord of the hose
cool alternate modal

cons
if pieces break off, you need to look in the manual because its so complicated
